verses.verse: Then drew <S%H7126><s%> near the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph; <S%H3130><s%> and these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his daughters: <S%H1323><s%> Mahlah, <S%H4244><s%> Noah, <S%H5270><s%> and Hoglah, <S%H2295><s%> and Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> and Tirzah. <S%H8656><s%>

They stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> and all the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the Tent <S%H168><s%> of Meeting, <S%H4150><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"Our father <S%H1><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and he was not among <S%H8432><s%> the company <S%H5712><s%> of those who gathered themselves together <S%H3259><s%> against Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> in the company <S%H5712><s%> of Korah: <S%H7141><s%> but he died <S%H4191><s%> in his own sin; <S%H2399><s%> and he had no sons. <S%H1121><s%>

Why should the name <S%H8034><s%> of our father <S%H1><s%> be taken away <S%H1639><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> his family, <S%H4940><s%> because he had no son? <S%H1121><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> to us a possession <S%H272><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the brothers <S%H251><s%> of our father. <S%H1><s%>"
Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> their cause <S%H4941><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh. <S%H3068><s%>
Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

"The daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> right: <S%H3651><s%> you shall surely <S%H5414><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> them a possession <S%H272><s%> of an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> their father <S%H1><s%>'s brothers; <S%H251><s%> and you shall cause the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%> to pass to them. <S%H5674><s%>

You shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H376><s%> 'If a man dies, <S%H4191><s%> and has no son, <S%H1121><s%> then you shall cause his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> to his daughter. <S%H1323><s%>
If he has no daughter, <S%H1323><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to his brothers. <S%H251><s%>
If he has no brothers, <S%H251><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to his father <S%H1><s%>'s brothers. <S%H251><s%>

If his father <S%H1><s%> has no brothers, <S%H251><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to his kinsman <S%H7607><s%> who is next <S%H7138><s%> to him of his family, <S%H4940><s%> and he shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it: <S%H1121><s%> and it shall be to the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> a statute <S%H2708><s%> and ordinance, <S%H4941><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>'"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Go up <S%H5927><s%> into this mountain <S%H2022><s%> of Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
When you have seen <S%H7200><s%> it, <S%H622><s%> you also shall be gathered to your people, <S%H5971><s%> as Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> was gathered; <S%H622><s%>

because you rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against my word <S%H6310><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin, <S%H6790><s%> in the strife <S%H4808><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> me at the waters <S%H4325><s%> before their eyes. <S%H5869><s%>" (These are the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah <S%H4809><s%> of Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin. <S%H6790><s%>)
Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>
"Let Yahweh, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all flesh, <S%H1320><s%> appoint <S%H6485><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> over the congregation, <S%H5712><s%>

who may go out <S%H3318><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H935><s%> and who may come in before <S%H6440><s%> them, <S%H3318><s%> and who may lead them out, and who may bring them in; <S%H935><s%> that the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> not be as sheep <S%H6629><s%> which have no shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>"

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Take <S%H3947><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> in whom is the Spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and lay <S%H5564><s%> your hand on him; <S%H3027><s%>

and set <S%H5975><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> all the congregation; <S%H5712><s%> and commission <S%H6680><s%> him in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>
You shall put <S%H5414><s%> of your honor <S%H1935><s%> on him, <S%H5712><s%> that all the congregation of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may obey. <S%H8085><s%>

He shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who shall inquire <S%H7592><s%> for him by the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of the Urim <S%H224><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Yahweh: <S%H3068><s%> at his word <S%H6310><s%> shall they go out, <S%H3318><s%> and at his word <S%H6310><s%> they shall come in, <S%H935><s%> both he, <S%H1121><s%> and all the children of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, <S%H5712><s%> even all the congregation."

Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him; <S%H3947><s%> and he took Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> all the congregation: <S%H5712><s%>
and he laid <S%H5564><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> on him, <S%H6680><s%> and commissioned him, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh spoke <S%H1696><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
